org: SPIRE Lab, Indian Institute of Science (IISc)
description: Leading research in speech production using advanced medical imaging techniques including real-time MRI and electromagnetic articulography.
bullets: Research on speech production using real-time MRI and electromagnetic articulography (EMA).
Investigated co-articulation, velum dynamics, and articulatory symmetry during VCV sequences.
Built analysis pipelines and visualizations for articulatory data.
Co-authored an Interspeech 2025 paper; nominated for Best Student Paper Award.
Developed MATLAB and Python tools for rtMRI data processing and analysis.
Collaborated with international research teams on speech production studies.
